1633920.name: Zen Landscape Editor Demo
1633920.description:
Zen Landscape Editor Demo is a preview of a tool for creating beautiful hexagonal landscapes for the purpose of taking screenshots or just relaxing. There's no challenge, no goal, and not much motion in this demo. It is set in the same environment as Zen World game, which is a relaxing but complex strategy about world building.

The demo version of the game limits the amount of space that is available to you, the types of different objects you can place in the world, as well as the total amount of objects placed.
1633920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
